email.invalid: Value must be a valid e-mail

password.min_length: The password must contain at least 10 characters
password.has_lower_case: The password must contain at least 1 lower case letter
password.has_upper_case: The password must contain at least 1 upper case letter
password.has_number: The password must contain at least 1 number
password.has_special_char: The password must contain at least 1 special character

full_name.required: You must enter your full name

description.min_length: The description must contain at least 15 characters

brand.min_length: The brand must contain at least 5 characters

cost.positive_number: The cost must contain a positive number

delete_user.fail: The user could not be deleted

add_order.fail: The order could not be added

edit_order.fail: The order could not be updated

delete_order.fail: The order could not be deleted

logout.title: Are you leaving?
logout.desc: The current session will be completed.

delete_user.title: Are you sure?
delete_user.desc: The user will be permanently deleted from the system!

delete_order.title: Are you sure?
delete_order.desc: The order will be permanently deleted from the system!

not_authorized.title: Access error!
not_authorized.desc: You are not authorized to view this page.

move_to_archive.title: Move the order to the archive?
move_to_archive.desc: The order will disappear from the general list and appear in the archive.

move_from_archive.title: Move the order to the general list?
move_from_archive.desc: The order will disappear from the archive and appear in the general list.
